SEARCH
Package model

Class Client

java.lang.Object
model.Customer
public class Client extends Object
Represents a customer in the system. The Client class contains personal information such as the customer's identification, contact details, and order history. This class can be serialized to XML.
Version:
0.1
Author:
DaniAndries

  • Constructor Details

    • Client

      public Client(String dni, String clientName, String direction, String phone, String mail, String password)
      Constructs a Client object with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      dni - the national identification number of the customer
      clientName - the name of the customer
      direction - the address of the customer
      phone - the phone number of the customer
      mail - the email address of the customer
      password - the password for the customer's account

    • Client

      public Client(String dni, String clientName, String direction, String phone, String mail, String password, boolean admin)
      Constructs a Client object with admin privileges.
      Parameters:
      dni - the national identification number of the customer
      clientName - the name of the customer
      direction - the address of the customer
      phone - the phone number of the customer
      mail - the email address of the customer
      password - the password for the customer's account
      admin - indicates if the customer has admin privileges

    • Client

      public Client(int id, String dni, String clientName, String direction, String phone, String mail, String password, boolean admin)
      Constructs a Client object with an ID and admin privileges.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier for the customer
      dni - the national identification number of the customer
      clientName - the name of the customer
      direction - the address of the customer
      phone - the phone number of the customer
      mail - the email address of the customer
      password - the password for the customer's account
      admin - indicates if the customer has admin privileges

    • Client

      public Client()
      Default constructor for creating an empty Client object.

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Compares this customer to another object for equality. Two Client objects are considered equal if they have the same id, dni, name, direction, phone, mail, password, and admin status.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      o - the object to compare to
      Returns:
      true if this customer is equal to the specified object; false otherwise

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Returns a hash code value for this customer. The hash code is calculated based on the customer's dni, name, direction, phone, mail, password, and admin status.
      Overrides:
      hashCode in class Object
      Returns:
      a hash code value for this customer
